replies.body: It gonna reset so turn that frown upsidedown
LOVE THIS!{{sticker:sg-syndra}}

Has 80% of matches in match history of {{champion:136}} , doesnt get {{champion:136}} 's skin. Instead gets skins for champs he hasn't played in months
Nice thoughtful and sensitive bot Rito.
Maybe it was the bot's way of gently telling you to stop playing Aurelion Sol. {{sticker:sg-lulu}}
lmao, roasted
We just took Your Shop down. We are aware of an issue with the deals, at the moment. We are working on an update to get it up, ASAP. Hopefully, the update will yield better results for all.
Thanks for considering those of us who actually got skins we enjoyed; just like last time, refreshed without choice.
If you write it in to Player Support, we will honor the deal. They have a record of the first set of offers we displayed to everyone.
I do appreciate that, it is nice to hear there is an option.

Hi, I already bought a skin in my shop because it was very cheap and seemed like a good deal.  I heard that there was something wrong with the system so could I possibly get a refund and receive a different shop? If not I completely understand but can u change the other deals besides the one I bought?
Write a ticket in.

Eternum Cassiopeia??
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
give me a redo rito plz
Is it the same bug as last time where everyone gets skins for champs they don't play? -_-

"The thoughtful and sensitive Discountbot selects six skins that it thinks you’ll like"

I think you need to fix the bot
Nothing I could use nor desire, super bummed.  That is twice in a row now...  {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
If Riot wants my money why don't they give me something to spend it on...?

"Your shop is open!"
Where?
at home screen, below the RP/IP
I do not see this at all.  Please help!  Can I get a screenshot or something?  I've looked everywhere I feel.
idk if u skipped over the description in the link at the home or wut but it's down and they're fixing rn {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
So this smart bot is offering me a skin I refunded...
Hi am I the only one gets skins I like for champs I play XD

"The thoughtful and sensitive Discountbot selects six skins that it thinks you’ll like and offers them at varying discounts"

Nice joke.  I don't play Twitch, Blitz, Trist, J4, Nasus, or Gragas.

-sees shop
-sees championship {{champion:92}} 
-excited
-takes nap
-goes out to buy rp and other necessities
-comes back
-shop disabled due to an issue
-calmly checks forums 
-"hopefully reset will yield better results for all"
-pls

(I think this is my second time using the shop after a really long time. I would be crushed if riot couldn't help me out. Do i have a chance?)
send them a ticket on support they can bring back your deals from before this reset
Riot said that if you send in a ticket that they will honor your first shop skin options.

{{champion:115}} Before checking shop

{{champion:32}} After checking shop

*0pens all the boxes and see's Bard bard is 50% off*
375? dang cool ill get it should have eno-....
*see's 358 rp. cries a little inside*
Time for the classic "try to draw the character in paint and post it to Reddit and hope a Red sees it" strategy
u can just go 2 support they'll give u up to 50 Rp one time only to get something you want if u draw/make artwork and post it on the ticket
RNG jesus has not been kind it seems {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
My store is trash i want a refund {{sticker:sg-shisa}}
cant find my store anywhere on this new client. Can I get some directions please?
Logged in just to say that I don't use any of the champs I got skins for and 3 of them were 520 skins...

Smart and thoughtful?
It'll just checks my match history and include all mordekaiser skins.
funny since, you will get skins for champs for played once or twice

{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}} every single one of these skins i either own a beter skin for the champ already or i never actualy play the champ then i read the discription for my shop "we choose skins we think you will really enjoy" not to mention 5 of them are like 20%off already that i will never spend money on these skins :( i wish i got good skins all my friends are saying there skins where bad to :(
Discount Bot gave me nothing I wanted
Does this store ever refresh? Like is it a weekly reset for new skin options?
It's not supposed to, but we reset it this time because we made a mistake. We bring it back every once in a while with new deals

i cant find my shop, theres no special indicator for it anywhere on my client or in the regular shop and ive done these before so i dunno so unless {{champion:27}} is {{summoner:6}} away with it i guess somethings bugged for me {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

it's a pretty small icon. are you looking at your home screen, under where it shows your RP/IP? Next to the free champ rotation. also def try relogging if it's not there; there was an issue earlier where we had to reset it.
omg just got two skins i actually want! THANK YOU DISCOUNTBOT {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I'm just annoyed that yesterday as I was on my way back from being in class most of the day my friend texts me that my shop is open and I get all excited, 10 min later I'm back in my dorm and I open League and it's disabled.

I better get a good skin from it once it loads back up too because the fact that some people just by pure chance are able to get 2 sets of offers kinda annoys me. Not everyone was able to be online during it and those who were got lucky with this bug and now get even more discounts to pick from seeing as they can still buy from their previous shop with a ticket. 

It's not Riots fault if there's a sudden bug but still. It adds a level of unfairness now that it's resetting.
